description: Starts a voice tone analysis task. For more information about voice tone analysis, see Using Amazon Chime SDK voice analytics in the Amazon Chime SDK Developer Guide.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource to be updated. Valid values include the ID and ARN of the media insights pipeline.

parameters.name: KinesisVideoStreamSourceTaskConfiguration
parameters.description: The task configuration for the Kinesis video stream source of the media insights pipeline. The ARN of the stream. The channel ID. FragmentNumber (string) --- The unique identifier of the fragment to begin processing.

nested_params.name: FragmentNumber
nested_params.description: The unique identifier of the fragment to begin processing.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the client request. Use a different token for different voice tone analysis tasks. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: VoiceToneAnalysisTask
nested_items.description: The details of the voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: VoiceToneAnalysisTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: VoiceToneAnalysisTaskStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a voice tone analysis task was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a voice tone analysis task was updated.
